conclusion: Initial conditions: speed = 20 m/s, distance to puppy = 45 m, reaction time = 0.5 s
Calculate distance covered during reaction time: 10 m
Calculate remaining distance to the puppy: 35 m
Velocity-time graph shows deceleration from 20 m/s to 0 m/s over 4 s
Calculate stopping distance using kinematic equation: 40 m
Compare total stopping distance with distance to puppy: 50 m > 45 m
Conclusion: The puppy is not safe
